courseDescription: A study of selected topics designed for non-majors, or for elective credit within a major.  These courses will appear in the course schedule booklet, and will be more fully described in a booklet distributed to all academic advisors.
Problem-Solving and Analytical Skills: Critical analysis of historical and contemporary issues
